name: Andrélon Pro nature conditioner bamboo volume
composition: INGREDIËNTEN: Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Parfum, Bambusa Vulgaris Shoot (Bamboe) Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Liquid Endosperm (Kokoswater), Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.
